name: Sample Protocol
description: Sample protocol based on the Nature Protocols schema.

abstract.description: Please provide a brief description of the protocol.

introduction.description: Discuss the methods used in the protocol and the limitations.

materials.description: Please list every reagent and piece of equipment.

procedure.description: Provided as a numbered list of direct experimental instructions.

timing.description: please include a timeline indicating the approximate time each step or stage will take.

troubleshooting.description: Please include information on how to troubleshoot the most likely problems users will encounter with the protocol.

anticipated results.description: Please include information about the likely outcome of protocol

acknowledgements.description: Please note an acknowledgments section can be included.

contribution statement.description: Include a statement of responsibility in the manuscript that specifies the contribution of every author.

supplementary information.description: Provide other information related to the protocol.
